title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: Laws & Policies
body: Laws & Policies       Permit Applications & Park Compendium  The following links will provide you with commonly requested application forms for permits required for filming and other special park uses. Also, below you can find the park's compendium of regulations which is the official compilation of park rules enforced under Title 36 Code of Federal Regulations. Important information on possession of firearms inside National Park Service areas is below.   If you would like a film or other special use permit click here to learn more.   Compendium of Park Regulations Firearms in National Parks
